summary: wifi: iwlegacy: 4965: corrected fix for potential off-by-one overflow in il4965_rs_fill_link_cmd()
details:
wifi: iwlegacy: 4965: corrected fix for potential off-by-one overflow in il4965_rs_fill_link_cmd()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.143 by commit 2946d2ae5ace3ad77f9d1710a1eeb279070b3caf, it was introduced in version v5.10.137 by commit e7d6cac6967534e1298497e853964b3d3f994ce3. For more details please see the references link.
